name: Workclass Pte. Ltd.
description: Operator of an online job search platform intended to serve blue-collar workers. The company offers to help match employers with relevant workers as well as provides a portal for candidates to search and find jobs matching their skills, enabling individuals to search for jobs as well as provide companies access to resumes and hire matching candidates.
one_liner: Operator of an online job search platform intended to serve blue-collar workers. The company offers to help match employers with relevant workers as well as provides a portal for candidates to search and find jobs matching their skills, enabling individuals to search for jobs as well as provide companies access to resumes and hire matching candidates.
